message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product for a competitive price. I believe this product will be a great addition to your collection. My initial offer is $14,000 for the product.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint.

I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I believe the product's value exceeds $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $11,500 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
I'm glad we're close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $11,000 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,750 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting closer, but I still need to get closer to my minimum price. My next offer is $11,500 for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,900 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
